column2: Who said, "The woman you put here with me she gave me some fruit from the tree, and I ate it"?
Who said, "Am I my brother's keeper?"
Who said, "Look, I'm dying of starvation!... What good is my birthright to me now?"
Who said, "Don't ask me to leave you and turn back. I will go wherever you go and live wherever you live. Your people will be my people, and your God will be my God."
Who said, "Speak, for your servant is listening"
Who said, "Everything I heard in my country about your achievements and wisdom is true!... Truly I had not heard the half of it! Your wisdom is far greater than what I was told"
Who said, "I have been going back and forth across the earth, watching everything that’s going on"
Who said, "My God sent his angel to the lions' mouths so that they would not hurt me."
Who said, "I am the light of the world."
Who said, "We must obey God rather than human authority"
Who said, "The voice is the voice of Jacob, but the hands are the hands of Esau"
Who said, "You rebuke the arrogant, who are accursed, those who stray from your commands."
